name: riverbed blanket
notes:
this is a crochet pattern, not a finished product.

you will receive a pdf file with step-by-step instructions on how to make the riverbed blanket. this pattern also includes a crochet diagram, images and written instructions, as well as a link to the youtube video to follow along.

this blanket is worked in the flat, you will be changing colours in every row. to join the new colour you will use the invisible knot, but you can also weave in the ends as you go.

all stitches are basics, there's no stitch that a beginner can't do, but i do recommend knowing all the basics before starting.

size: 14 sizes available. from lovey to king size
skill level: confident beginner
the pattern uses standard american terms
yarn: worsted weight yarn #4. wool-ease by lion brand yarn

i would love to see your finished products
